name: vsc-gitblame-info
description: A VSCode extension for getting information from git

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageDisplayLeft.description: Display status bar message to the left

gitBlameInfo.statusBarPositionPriority.description: Priority where the status bar view should be placed

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageFormat.description: Customize the standard status bar message

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageNoFileOpene.description: Customize the standard status bar message for when no file is opened

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageNoRepo.description: Customize the status bar message for when no repository was found

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageIgnoredFile.description: Customize the status bar message for when the current file is being ignored

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageNoCommit.description: Customize the status bar message for when the changes are not yet committed

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageNoInfoFound.description: Customize the status bar message for when no git info was found

gitBlameInfo.statusBarMessageLoading.description: Customize the status bar message for when the extension is loading

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
